dream_context.raw_idea_text: MemeVault A clean, fast meme library app that lets users save, organize, caption, and share memes with a polished UI and subscription-gated power features.
dream_context.user_intent: Meme collection and organization app with premium features
dream_context.transformation_approach: Evidence-based validation with market gap analysis

trends.name: Meme Collection Pain Points
trends.description: Users struggle with scattered meme storage across platforms and poor organization tools
trends.evidence: Reddit users report it's 'hard to save and find memes in albums' and need tools to 'categorize images, making it simpler to retrieve them later'

trends.name: Photo Organization Tool Adoption
trends.description: Growing demand for AI-powered organization tools over manual folder systems
trends.evidence: Users report significant time savings when switching 'from folder-based methods to AI tools' and appreciate 'searchable' solutions

trends.name: Content Creator Tool Demand
trends.description: Social media professionals need efficient asset management for rapid content creation
trends.evidence: Users seek tools that are 'much faster and simpler' and require browser extensions to collect content across platforms

market_research.monetization_trends: Users willing to pay for time-saving organization tools, especially with AI features and professional workflows

generated_ideas.signal_source: Market gap: no dedicated fast meme library apps with advanced organization and subscription tiers
generated_ideas.description: A clean, fast meme library app that lets users save, organize, caption, and share memes with a polished UI and subscription-gated power features
generated_ideas.target_user: Meme enthusiasts, social media content creators, and digital asset collectors who need efficient meme organization
generated_ideas.pain_point_evidence: Users report meme libraries 'spiral out of control fast' and find it 'hard to save and find memes' with current folder-based solutions
core_loop: Save meme from camera roll, screenshot, or import
Auto-tag with AI or add custom tags/captions
Browse organized library with search and filtering
Share individual memes or curated collections
Discover trending memes from integrated feeds
generated_ideas.differentiation: First dedicated meme library app with AI-powered organization, advanced search, and subscription-tier professional features
generated_ideas.subscription_fit: Premium: unlimited storage, AI auto-tagging, advanced search, custom organization, high-quality exports, priority support

pricing.trial_strategy: Free tier: 100 memes, basic folders. 14-day premium trial with full features

standards_compliance.excluded_categories_check: PASSED - No dating, gambling, crypto, medical, financial, or 18+ content
standards_compliance.subscription_model: COMPLIANT - RevenueCat integration for subscription tiers
standards_compliance.platform_support: iOS + Android with Expo React Native
standards_compliance.store_readiness: Designed for App Store and Google Play submission

validation_summary.market_evidence_strength: Strong - clear user pain points with no direct competitors
validation_summary.recommendation: PROCEED to full development pipeline - strong market opportunity with clear differentiation

next_steps.pipeline_progression: Execute Stages 02-10 for MemeVault idea pack
next_steps.idea_pack_creation: Create single idea pack with complete stage pipeline
next_steps.build_target: Complete store-ready Expo React Native app
